main.name: Asbat El Khairi
main.bio: A double Master degree holder in Computer Science and an enthusiastic Information Security researcher. My main research focus is on applying Machine Learning techniques and algorithms within the domains of Phishing, Malware Analysis/Detection, Intrusion Detection, Open-Source Vulnerability Analysis, et cetera. Also, I am an adaptive and fast-learning person with a demonstrated experience in Information Security and Software Engineering. Currently, I am working as a Cybersecurity analyst at Siemens, analyzing and evaluating security vulnerabilities in third-party software.
main.intro: Information Security Researcher, Cybersecurity Analyst, Android Developer, and Software Entrepreneur based in Munich
